item.description:
This is the Boston Bruins "Legends Classic" held outdoors at Fenway Park!! No, that is not a typo. This event will be an outdoor hockey game played live at Fenway Park.

This is not an official NFL game, but a host of Bruins' greats and celebrities including, among others, B's legend and current team Vice President Cam Neely and Worcester native actor/comedian Denis Leary. This celebrity studded event will be a legendary battle under the shadow of the Green Monster at Fenway Park.

Roster: Alumni: Bob Beers, Andy Brickley, Lyndon Byers, Cleon Daskalakis, Gary Doak, Ken Hodge, Ken Linseman, John McKenzie, Rick Middleton, Jay Miller, Cam Neely, Terry O'Reilly, Brad Park, Tom Songin, Rick Smith, Don Sweeney, Bob Sweeney Celebrities: Charlie Jacobs, Tom Werner, Ken Casey, Bobby Farrelly, Pat LaFontaine, Denis Leary, Brian Leetch, Neal McDonough, Tim Robbins, Dave Schultz, Kiefer Sutherland

The game starts at 2:00pm, but we should plan to meet in front of the Yawkey Way Store at 1:30 so we can get inside, get some hot chocolate (or shots of whiskey to keep us warm) and snacks. Tickets are $25 each plus a $2.00 processing fee.

NOTE: If you RSVP yes you are commiting to paying the $25 ticket fee. Do not order tickets on your own - I will get tickets together and complete that order on Dec 29th. So if you RSVP yes and don't attend, you'll still owe me for the ticket which I will be purchasing with my own money. Please pay me in cash at the event. Proceeds benefit the Boston Bruins Foundation, Red Sox Foundation and Hockey Fights Cancer.
item.how_to_find_us: In front of Yawkey Way store - I'll send my cell number the day before.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Legends Classic: Hockey at Fenway
